findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical parameters and perform sensitive actions.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward(), _getCurrentSupply, and excludeFromReward() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
